name: Elisa Oyj
goal: Elisa is a telecommunications, ICT and online service company serving 2.3 million consumer, corporate and public administration organisation customers. Elisa provides environmentally sustainable services for communication and entertainment, and tools for improving operating methods and productivity of organisations. In Finland Elisa is the market leader in mobile subscriptions. Cooperation with Vodafone and Telenor enables globally competitive services. Elisa is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki Large Cap with over 200 000 shareholders.  www.elisa.com
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Digital Single Market Strategy, Data Protection Regulation.
